item.title: American University List of Most American Automobiles
item.author: James Evans
item.description: Each year American University releases a list of automobiles ranked by total domestic content (TDC). This year’s list is available on their website. The 2020 Ford Ranger tops the list. Ford and GMC have the most automobiles on the list but Honda Motor Company is also well represented. The automobile industry utilizes a distributed and global supply chain so nothing is made 100% in America.

item.title: Stirling Engine Build
item.author: James Evans
item.description: The kids and I kicked off the new year by building a Stirling Cycle engine. We used a 3D print kit from the excellent site Kontax Stirling Engines. Print files are available at PrusaPrinters.org. I modified the settings slightly. Print time was a little over 6 hours. The manual is well done. My seven year old was able to follow along with no issues. Our engine runs well. It will operate on the printer’s heat bed at 25°C above ambient. At 35°C above ambient it turns at approximately 120 rpm.
